main event: A tower operator observed a pulsing blue light that changed colors and dissolved into two light sources before quickly ascending out of sight.
interesting points: The observation lasted 1-2 minutes, The light displayed a deep blue color with a pulsating quality, The light changed to white and then back to blue before disappearing, Four controllers confirmed the sighting, The possibility of it being a natural phenomenon or technology unfamiliar to the observer was considered.
witness description: tower operator and other controllers at Logan International Airport
